viewLoginMessage.message: Sign in to your Firefox account to start using Private Network.

viewMainProxyOff.message: Using public Wi-Fi without a secure connection can put you at risk of identity theft, snooping, and malware infection.

viewMainProxyOn.message: Your connection is secure, and your location is hidden from websites and trackers, making it tougher for those annoying targeted ads to track you online.

viewProxyErrorGeneric.message: Your connection was dropped. Try turning Firefox Private Network on again.

viewProxyErrorOtherProxyInUse.message: You cannot use Firefox Private Network because you are using a custom proxy setting.

viewProxyErrorAuthFailed.message: Your connection was dropped. Try turning Firefox Private Network on again.

toastSignIn.message: Sign in to use Firefox Private Network

toastProxyOn.message: âœ“ Firefox Private Network is on

toastWarning.message: Firefox Private Network needs your attention!
